caption: The video seems to start on an alien planet where a group of tall blue humanoid beings are interacting and communicating with each other. They pick fruit from trees to eat and engage in activities reminiscent of humans. As the scene shifts to night, a man awakens from his hibernation pod. He sits in a wheelchair and pays a visit to a muscular captain. The captain then steps into a large humanoid mech suit, demonstrating to him how it operates. The next day, the man connects his consciousness to one of the blue tall humanoid bodies. Together with his commanding officer, they board a plane and delve deep into the alien planet to explore.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Does it looks like real story? Or it looks like a science fiction movie?)
global.answer: No it isn't, it looks like a science fiction movie.
